ovdesc.p: This file contains a list of cheque numbers that have been presented for payment. The file is updated automatically by the core accounting routines as and when cheques are presented.
Updated Automatically by the core accounting routines

desc.p: Every time, cheque is presented again, the count gets incremented by one. When the underlying transaction is reversed, count gets decremented . Taken care by core accounting system

This file contains a list of cheque numbers that have been presented for payment. The file is updated automatically by the core accounting routines as and when cheques are presented.ID of the file is Account no - Cheque number presented.
Descriptor to Account number of ID
Descriptor to Cheque number part of ID
Date on which the cheque is presented.
